welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ainsdale, a charming town on the coast of the United Kingdom. Known for its stunning beaches and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Blackpool Airport caters to private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
